description:
Nitro PDF Pro is an application used to create, edit, sign, and secure PDF files and digital documents.


Fixed Issues & Improvements
- Updated the installation process to check for required system dependencies
- Fixed crash in Auto Form Create when working with documents stored in OneDrive
- Improved file combining reliability by resolving a hang issue
- Improved compatibility with PRO HLCAPI / CrawfordTech PDFs, ensuring correct display of previously unreadable content
- Fixed PDF/A-2b conversion issues to ensure fonts are properly embedded
- Improved loading performance by handling service calls in the background and skipping unnecessary network requests
- Optimized disk usage by no longer saving the installer to each user profileâ€™s AppData folder
- Fixed issues with Nitro PDF Creator to ensure accurate rendering of images and 3D content
- Fixed an issue where some documents could lose bookmarks after Save As
- Fixed a crash that occurred with certain display scaling compatibility settings
- Resolved an issue so that Shift-select now correctly selects only the intended page range
- Fixed an issue with page tree duplications that could prevent saving some documents
- Radio buttons now work correctly after combining PDFs
- Improved security when viewing signed versions of documents
- Other fixes and improvements
